name: Good Harbor
description: Good Harbor Security Risk Management, LLC advises Boards, CEOs, CISOs and other corporate executives, investment professionals, and government leaders on managing cyber risk. An elite, boutique team with decades of experience advising CEOs, Boards, investors, and senior government leaders. A trusted advisor on cyber security risk management. Situated at the nexus of corporate governance, law, regulations, technology, intelligence, venture capital, and policy.
